channel.title: Help with ip and batch

item.title: Help with ip and batch
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:10, topic:243321”][quote author=Kalphiter link=topic=319641.msg2533708#msg2533708 date=1226622364]

u need 2 port forward, check portforward.com

aaaand… if u wanna chang ethat 0000 thing look in server.java and search for that 0.0.0 and thats where it is, compile thats changed
[/quote]YOU IDIOT, THE IP IS IMPOSSIBLE TO CHANGE. You don’t know what you’re talking about.

It’s just a misc.printIn(""); Last I checked you could change things that are in sendmessage too…[/quote]

Ok, you didn’t understand it.

127.0.0.1
0.0.0.0
localhost

Are all ways to connect to localhost. It is impossible to change those.

and you mean “misc.println();”, because ln = line. In Notepad it looks the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ip and batch
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:6, topic:243321”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=319641.msg2532460#msg2532460 date=1226541603]
u need 2 port forward, check portforward.com

aaaand… if u wanna chang ethat 0000 thing look in server.java and search for that 0.0.0 and thats where it is, compile thats changed
[/quote]YOU IDIOT, THE IP IS IMPOSSIBLE TO CHANGE. You don’t know what you’re talking about.[/quote]

It’s just a misc.printIn(""); Last I checked you could change things that are in sendmessage too…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ip and batch
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

Ok listen. No matter what IP you connect to, 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1, your IP address, your No-IP DNS address, or anything of the sort, it is the same server.

Like he said, you need to portforward… and um… advertise it?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ip and batch
item.dc:creator: @cvan1 cvan1
item.description:
@cvan1 wrote:

I really need help with this. I’ve looked all around and can’t seem to find anything so dont get mad if you think there is another post like this…sorry i guess…but
anyway…when i start my server it says " Starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594" and it works i can log on etc. But no one else can get on my server
i was thinking its because of the 0.0.0.0 ip. If im wrong please correct me I really need your help :D. in runserver when u edit it it says :

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Cvan1.no-ip.biz
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

How can i add an ip in there if u even can??
Do I even need to?
How can I make my server public?
Please answer if u know the answer none of that " hahaha noob" nonsence like that plz

Read full topic
